text: Lycée Alfred Kastler de Cergy-Pontoise is a senior high school located in Pontoise, Val-d'Oise, France, in the Paris metropolitan area, serving both Pontoise and Cergy."1978-2011 : l’Histoire continue." Lycée Alfred Kastler de Cergy-Pontoise. Retrieved on September 6, 2016. "Le lycée Alfred Kastler, administrativement dans le bassin de Cergy, géographiquement situé à Pontoise,[...]" It opened on 15 September 1978 as the Lycée de Cergy Ville Nouvelle and it was renamed after Alfred Kastler on 7 February 1989. Students originate from, in addition to Pointoise and Cergy, Éragny, Gency, Herblay, Jouy le Moutier, Magny en Vexin, and Osny. there are 315 students. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Alfred Kastler de Cergy-Pontoise Category:Lycées in Val-d'Oise Category:1978 establishments in France Category:Educational institutions established in 1978 Category:Lycées in Cergy-Pontoise
title: Lycée Alfred Kastler de Cergy-Pontoise
